gurmukhi: ibrh dwvwnl pRgtI n qn bn ibKY Asn bsn qw mY GiRq prjwir hY
transliteration: Birah Daavaanal Pragatee N Tan Ban Bikhai , Asan Basan Taa Mai Ghrit Parajaari Hai ?
translation: The separation of my beloved is not only appearing in my body, like the fire of jungle, but all these dainty dishes and dresses instead of giving me comfort are acting like oil in raising the intensity of fire and consequently my sufferings.

gurmukhi: pRQm pRkwsy DUm AiqhI dushw duK qwhI qy ggn Gn Gtw AMDkwr hY
transliteration: Pradam Prakaasay Dhoom Atihee Dousahaa Doukha , Taahee Tay Gagan Ghan Ghataa Andhakaar Hai ?
translation: Firstly, this separation, because of the sighs associated with it is appearing like smoke and thus unbearable and then this smoke is looking like dark clouds in the sky causing darkness all around.

gurmukhi: BBk BBUko h√çY pRkwsXo hY Akws sis qwrkw mMfl icngwrI cmkwr hY
transliteration: Bhabhak Bhabhooko Hvai Prakaasayo Hai Akaas Sasi , Taarakaa Mandal Chinagaaree Chamakaar Hai ?
translation: Even the moon in the sky is looking like a flame. The stars are appearing to me as the sparks of that fire.

gurmukhi: kw isE khau kYsy AMqkwl biRQwvMq giq moih duK soeI suKdweI sMswr hY ]668]
transliteration: Kaa Siao Kahau Kaisay Antakaal Bridaavant Gati , Mohi Doukh Soee Soukhadaaee Sansaar Hai ?668?
translation: Like a patient nearing his death, whom should I tell this state that has resulted due to the fire of separation? All these things (moon, stars, dresses etc.) are becoming uncomfortable and painful for me, whereas all these are highly peace-giving and sour
